HomePage.title: Uniting Alumni Across Generations
HomePage.about2: IKA SMA Negeri 6 Makassar is a cross-generational alumni organization that aims to strengthen connections, build networks, and contribute to both the school and the community.
HomePage.activity2: Behind every reunion, social action, and alumni gathering lies the spirit of staying connected and growing together. We believe that togetherness is the key to a thriving community.
HomePage.alumni2: Hundreds of alumni from various graduating years and backgrounds are now connected in one community. From recent graduates to seasoned professionals â€” all are here, ready to support one another.
HomePage.joinus: Be Part of the Alumni Family
HomePage.joinus2: Reconnect, relive memories, and collaborate across generations with the extended SMA 6 Makassar family.

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.text2: The Alumni Association of SMA Negeri 6 Makassar is an organization founded by former students of SMA Negeri 6 Makassar. Its mission is to foster camaraderie, enhance networking, and contribute to the development of both the school and the broader community.
AboutPage.gtext1: Organizing reunions, gatherings, and social activities to strengthen bonds among alumni.
AboutPage.gtext2: Providing support in the form of funding, facilities, and programs that enhance the quality of education at SMA Negeri 6 Makassar.
AboutPage.gtext3: Helping alumni grow their business, professional, and social networks.
AboutPage.gtext4: Running social assistance programs to support alumni facing challenges.
